metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4946 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Horde Internet MailProgram (IMP) before 6.1.8, as used in Horde Groupware Webmail Editionbefore 5.1.5, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia (1) unspecified flags or (2) a mailbox name in the dynamic mailboxview.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4946` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-imp - 6.2.12-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-imp package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.12-1ubuntu1').
